title: Privacy Issue on protected tweets

profile.name: Twitter
profile.about: Twitter helps you create and share ideas and information instantly, without barriers.

vulnerability_information:
Hello Twitter Security Team, 

###Problem:
Here is a privacy issue that break your privacy for protected tweets.

###Details:
I have two accounts on twitter @dia2diab and @Dia2diabTest , from the first one i changed the settings of Tweet privacy to be "Protect my Tweets" and now if you access one of my tweets like this one here twitter.com/dia2diab/status/585987812643708928 Or here mobile.twitter.com/dia2diab/status/585987812643708928 from a private window you will find that "@dia2diab's Tweets are protected.". great !!

Now, i don't wanna @Dia2diabTest to see anything from my tweets, so i decided to block him, i think now this user can't see my tweets by anyway [i blocked him & i made my tweets private].

The amazing thing when i access this url mobile.twitter.com/dia2diab/status/585987812643708928 with my logged in session with the second user i found that i can see the tweet.

This is break your privacy rules there support.twitter.com/articles/14016

###Fixing:
You must need to protect your users privacy.

@dia2diab

Can you confirm that you set your privacy settings to "protect your tweets" ? I can currently see that the profile `twitter.com/dia2diab` is public and so are its tweets. If the account is public, then blocking someone does not mean that he/she cannot view your tweets.

Please confirm.

activities.message:
Hello @dia2diab

I can see the issue here. It is because twitter handle dia2diabTEST is following dia2diab already when you set your tweets to be private. In that case, he can still view the tweets even after making them private (because he is a follower already). And blocking him, again, is not a means to prevent him from looking at your tweets. 

Do you agree there is no issue here? You can try by first unfollowing dia2diab from account dia2diabTEST, then make tweets of dia2diab protected. After that dia2diabTEST won't be able to see dia2diab tweets no matter what.
